suncertify.db
Class CachingRecordsHandler

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.CachingRecordsHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Data.RecordsHandler
public class CachingRecordsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements Data.RecordsHandler

A records handler which adds the behavior for caching records stream to a wrapped records handler.

Author:
Mohammad S. Abdellatif

Constructor Summary
CachingRecordsHandler(Data.RecordsHandler handler)
          Construct records caching handler to wrap handler.
 
Method Summary
 int create(byte[] record)
          Navigate create call to wrapped records handler then caches the record if creation is success.
 void delete(int recNo)
          Navigate delete to wrapped records handler then remove the record data from cache if exist.
 byte[] read(int recNo)
          Returns the cached bytes, if nothing found in cache read record from wrapped record handler then caches it.
 void update(int recNo, byte[] record)
          Navigate update call to wrapped records handler then caches the updated record data if update is success.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

public byte[] read(int recNo)
            throws RecordNotFoundException,
                   java.io.IOException
Returns the cached bytes, if nothing found in cache read record from wrapped record handler then caches it.

Throws:
